Alias.name: travelling
Alias.script: echo("You need: ginseng, tarragon leaves, clover")

Alias.name: dotravelling
Alias.script: domix = "true" enableTrigger("herblorecantget") send("get ginseng all") send("get tarragon all") send("get clover all") if domix == "true" then send("put ginseng") send("put tarragon ") send("put clover") else echo("Ingredient missing. Interrupting.") end disableTrigger("herblorecantget")
